title: Bag
medium:
Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: warp-faced plain weave with supplementary warp patterning
description: Broad stripes of brown and gray flanking a central stripe with geometric pattern in red and white with two superimposed pencil stripes in pink and blue, green and yellow. Groups of pencil-stripes at outer edges. Wool warp, white cotton weft. Center stripe has paired white cotton warps in ground, pattern warp of dark red wool. Tubular embroidered wool edging. Pair of tassels in colored wools in each of four corners.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bag.Medium: wool, cotton
Technique: warp-faced plain weave with supplementary warp patterning. 1957-69-1.
